channel.title: Add Model Command?
channel.description:
Anyone got the Add Model command ? I need it to add the Gfx Tele. I tried ::addmodel 3008, ::add model 3008 and add model 3008 and it doesn't work. Anyone got the code ?
Thanks.

item.title: Add Model Command?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

…yet another reason people say moparscape fails.

Loading Models is not rocket science.

L2google, L2search, L2tutorial section.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Model Command?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

TheImpureOne:

Old thing I can say is ask the guy that post the models for help. I’m not that great with clients. Also I don’t know what client your using or anything about the client. So, it could be different.(Some clients have 2 model folders, which is kinda stupid…)

Nevermind, I fixed. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Model Command?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I’m trying to do this thing: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,375601.0.html

I added the model… I downloaded it and put it in Model folder. He tells me to do “add model 3008” but it doesn’t work ! And my teleport it working well but I can’t see the blue thing all around me when I’m teleporting.

Please help.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Model Command?
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

You have to add the model into the folder before you type the command, Because the command looks for the model in the folder to add it. If you need a model look in
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,129.0.html

They have tons of models for anyones disposal.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Model Command?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Nevermind, I found how to do it. I typed “add models 3008”. It worked but I can’t see the model 3008 in my model folder. How?

Read full topic

item.title: Add Model Command?
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

I’m not supposed to spoon feed you but I will anyway, Open client.java and search for @gre@ and add this

if(s.startsWith("add models")) { for(int anIntX = 0; anIntX < 10500; anIntX++) { byte[] abyte0 = GetModel(anIntX); if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0){ aClass14Array970[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, anIntX); method77("Model: ["+anIntX+"] added successfully!", 0, "", aBoolean991); }else{ } } }

after the } which is after the break;

Post any errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Model Command?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“TheImpureOne, post:2, topic:295382”]Are you using the client that you added the items into?
Check the run.bat file and see if it says anything about the model in there.
If all else fails, open client.java in the client and search for "add (make sure you have the " and at least one space after the word add).

If that fails then post again and I’ll help you further.[/quote]

I found nothing about "add in client.java. (Nothing about the add model command) Please give me the code so my Telegfx can get it Model.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Model Command?
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

Are you using the client that you added the items into?
Check the run.bat file and see if it says anything about the model in there.
If all else fails, open client.java in the client and search for "add (make sure you have the " and at least one space after the word add).

If that fails then post again and I’ll help you further.

Read full topic
